## QueueEventsDeclaration.on() method

Listen to 'cleaned' event.

This event is triggered when a cleaned method is triggered.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
on(event: 'cleaned', listener: (args: {
        count: string;
    }, id: string) => void): this;
```
